tool_description: The Text Translation API is a state-of-the-art tool that automatically detects the language of input text and translates it into the specified target language. It uses advanced natural language processing algorithms to accurately identify input language, and advanced translation algorithms to provide accurate and high-quality translations. The API supports a wide range of languages, including popular and less common languages, making it suitable for both personal and business use. Its automat...
name: Text Translation
title: Text Translation

api_list.name: /translate
api_list.description: The /translate endpoint is a post request API that allows users to translate text into the specified target language. Users can send a request containing the text to be translated and the target language code in the request body. The endpoint uses advanced translation algorithms to provide accurate and high-quality translations. This endpoint is a powerful tool that can help users save time and effort when translating content across languages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translation5.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translation5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translation5.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translation5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
